metadata.title: CVE-2023-52504 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:x86/alternatives: Disable KASAN in apply_alternatives() Fei has reportedthat KASAN triggers during apply_alternatives() on a 5-level pagingmachine: BUG: KASAN: out-of-bounds in rcu_is_watching() Read of size 4 ataddr ff110003ee6419a0 by task swapper/0/0 ... __asan_load4()rcu_is_watching() trace_hardirqs_on() text_poke_early()apply_alternatives() ... On machines with 5-level paging,cpu_feature_enabled(X86_FEATURE_LA57) gets patched. It includes KASAN code,where KASAN_SHADOW_START depends on __VIRTUAL_MASK_SHIFT, which is definedwith cpu_feature_enabled(). KASAN gets confused when apply_alternatives()patches the KASAN_SHADOW_START users. A test patch that makesKASAN_SHADOW_START static, by replacing __VIRTUAL_MASK_SHIFT with 56, worksaround the issue. Fix it for real by disabling KASAN while the kernel ispatching alternatives. [ mingo: updated the changelog ]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52504` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-186-generic - 5.4.0-186.206
linux-image-5.4.0-186-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-186.206
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-186-generic - 5.4.0-186.206
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-186-lowlatency - 5.4.0-186.206
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1114-kvm - 5.4.0-1114.121
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1126-aws - 5.4.0-1126.136
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1131-azure - 5.4.0-1131.138
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1056-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1056.64~20.04.1.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1130-gcp - 5.4.0-1130.139
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1093-gkeop - 5.4.0-1093.97
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1073-ibm - 5.4.0-1073.78
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1125-oracle - 5.4.0-1125.134
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1110-raspi - 5.4.0-1110.122
No subscription required

No subscription required
